SELECT A.id,A.parentNo,A.topic,A.serialNo,A.jobNumber,B.FHumanName as createdPerson ,A.createdTime,C.FDeptFullName AS deptName,A.deptId, A.problemAttach,A.orderStatus,F.name as orderDesc,A.isTransfer,A.description,A.receiver,A.order_type FROM subOrder A LEFT JOIN tsysuser B ON A.jobNumber=B.FUserName LEFT JOIN tsysdept C ON A.deptId=C.FDeptId LEFT JOIN orderStatus F ON F.id=A.orderStatus WHERE A.parentNo =#{parentNo}
ORDER BY A.serialNo asc

SELECT A.id,A.parentNo,A.topic,A.serialNo,A.jobNumber,B.FHumanName as createdPerson ,A.createdTime,C.FDeptFullName AS deptName,A.deptId, A.problemAttach,A.orderStatus,F.name as orderDesc,A.isTransfer,A.description,A.receiver,A.order_type,D.FHumanName as receiverName FROM subOrder A LEFT JOIN tsysuser B ON A.jobNumber=B.FUserName LEFT JOIN tsysdept C ON A.deptId=C.FDeptId LEFT JOIN orderStatus F ON F.id=A.orderStatus LEFT JOIN tsysuser D ON A.receiver=D.FUserName WHERE A.serialNo =#{serialNo}
SELECT A.id,A.parentNo,A.topic,A.serialNo,A.jobNumber,A.createdTime,A.deptId, A.problemAttach,A.orderStatus,A.isTransfer,A.description,A.receiver,A.order_type FROM subOrder A WHERE A.id =#{id}
SELECT * FROM subOrder WHERE serialNo =(SELECT max(serialNo) FROM subOrder WHERE parentNo = #{orderId})
